Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Kaiser::
       As the first shot slams into his shoulder he grimaces and allows it to 
throw him into a shoulder roll.  Mid-roll he resheathes his scimitars and 
draws both of his heavy blasters.  He finishes his roll in a crouch and 
launches a pair of shots at each of the five rogues.

--part1_25.3440127d.2b7d4a7c_boundary
